parameters.name: app_id
parameters.description: ID of your developer application. You can find the App ID by navigating to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: secret
parameters.description: Secret of your developer application. You can find the Secret by navigating to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: event_type
parameters.description: The type of Webhook event that you subscribe to. Enum values: VIDEO : Post publishing events, which provide you with real-time updates on the status of content published via specific TikTok API endpoints. To learn more about the schema and sample payload of the events within this event category, see Post publishing events . COMMENT : comment update event, including the event comment.update . To learn more about the schema and sample payload of the event within this event category, see Comment update event .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: event_type
fields.description: The type of Webhook event that you subscribe to. Enum values: VIDEO : Post publishing events, which provide you with real-time updates on the status of content published via specific TikTok API endpoints. To learn more about the schema and sample payload of the events within this event category, see Post publishing events . COMMENT : comment update event, including the event comment.update . To learn more about the schema and sample payload of the event within this event category, see Comment update event .

fields.name: callback_url
fields.description: Returned only when the corresponding event configuration exists for your developer app. The callback URL. For example, if event_type is VIDEO and callback_url is not returned in the response, your developer app doesn't have an existing post publishing event Webhook configuration.

fields.name: item_list
fields.description: Returned only when event_type is COMMENT and item_list is configured for the developer app ( app_id ). The IDs of the specific TikTok posts that you will receive comment update event notifications for.
